generalTask: Develop a smart IoT-based parking management solution to optimize parking availability, monitor space usage, and provide real-time status updates to users.

timeline.summary: Developed user interface for parking dashboard, availability map, and booking screens using React.
timeline.task_description: Training on React.js and Tailwind CSS to build responsive UI components.

timeline.summary: Built REST APIs for space tracking, user registration, and real-time occupancy updates using FastAPI.
timeline.task_description: Refresher on RESTful API development and FastAPI integration with PostgreSQL.

timeline.summary: Installed and configured IR sensors in parking lots, integrated with Raspberry Pi to send MQTT messages to backend.
timeline.task_description: Training on Raspberry Pi sensors and MQTT protocol for real-time parking detection.

timeline.summary: Developed and deployed a model to predict space occupancy trends using historical data.
timeline.task_description: Trained on TensorFlow Lite for deploying models on edge devices.
